item.title: Skastic: An image-based esoteric programming language
item.description: This .png file is source code. I came across a post on slashdot recently about an esoteric programming language based on ASCII art. (https://developers.slashdot.org/story/17/08/13/2033239/new-asciidots-programming-language-uses-ascii-art-and-python). It's pretty novel and interesting, and in the comments section, people mentioned some related languages with similar characteristics which can be found on esolangs.org. I was intrigued by some other languages which use lines to show control or data flow, some of which are found in a list of two-dimensional languages https://esolangs.
